title: Andy Cohen and baby Benjamin share the same smile as duo pose for heartwarming Instagram snap
text:
He welcomed his first and only son into the world on Feb. 4.

And it seems that baby Benjamin has taken on his father's dashing good looks after proud papa Andy Cohen shared a selfie on Monday afternoon.

The 51-year-old Bravo patriarch and his little boy shared matching smiles for the sweet photo shared to his three million followers online.

Sweethearts: Andy Cohen and his little boy Benjamin shared matching smiles for the sweet photo shared to his three million followers online

Benjamin showed off a head full of chocolate brown hair and wore an adorable St. Louis Blues hockey jersey.

Andy was dressed down in a casual white T-shirt and showed off a scruffy beard to match his salt-and-pepper hair.

Both boys shared matching brown eyes with the sweetest grins across their faces while cuddled up together in bed.

The pair had a wild weekend sight-seeing in the city with a quick tour of the Statue of Liberty.

Boys just want to have fun: The pair had a wild weekend sight-seeing in the city with a quick tour of the Statue of Liberty.

What's the word? Andy also shared a hilarious image of Benjamin diving deep into new reading material before bedtime

Andy also shared a hilarious image of Benjamin diving deep into new reading material before bedtime.

During an appearance on Howard Stern earlier this year, the King of All Media asked Andy if the mother of baby Benjamin would be involved in any way, with Cohen replying that the 'egg donor will not be involved.'

Despite the usual chaos of his large, late-night life, Andy said he is enjoying settling into fatherhood after welcoming his son on Feb. 4.

'We're falling in love with each other and getting to know each other,' the proud dad boasted about his little boy.
